document.full_text: the alipay system affiliated with jack ma's alibaba group has received a license from china's central bank to operate an electronic payment system in the country, the company said on thursday.
document.title: alipay gets licence to set up e-payment system
lines_and_colors: the alipay system affiliated with jack ma's alibaba group has received a license from china's central bank to operate an electronic payment system in the country, the company said on thursday.
